name: Unown V
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: It is believed that the variety of types of this Pokémon were created by evolutionary adaptation, as each possesses a different ability.

abilities.name: [Vanish]
abilities.effect: When you play Unown V from your hand, you may flip a coin. If heads, return 1 of your Pokémon with Unown in its name (other than Unown V) to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

rule_box:
When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
